After an exhausting day at work, the young firefighter Jeremy Coleman (Josh Duhamel) goes out drinking with friends - but ends up witnessing a crime brutal. Assisting the detective Mike Cella (Bruce Willis), he agrees to identify the perpetrator. But the killer proves he knows who he is and starts to threaten him. Forced to abandon his career and join the witness protection program, Jeremy tries to rebuild his life. But an unexpected turn of judicial puts the criminal back on the streets. Thus, the former firefighter will join a rival gang to protect yourself and the people you love, fighting fire with fire.
